amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to require a GAO study on the impacts of offshore drilling on coastal communities and coastal economies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
